oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The man (belonging to the early race) who ordered his wife to cut off his ears. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-12. 7095-7097). A man thinks his younger brother's head-skin has been cut off, but he has in fact only had his hair shaved off.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The man who ordered his wife to cut off his ears
